description: Email templates for USC operations.  The email template file contains a sender, subject, and contents section for customization.  Macros are replaced in the email before it is sent.  Macros are described below and must start and end with @ sign.

required.description: The token that is emailed to the end user.
A link to the change password page.  This link is built internally to the runtime change password html page.
The first name of the user.
The family name of the user.
The device details of the requestor.
The location of the the requestor based on the IP address.
